name: Tech Blog component collection
description:
Portfolio project #2

Component collection


A collection of multi-purpose components in different genres for a tec-blog site project. Designed specifically for desktop screens and can be easily converted to other screens. 100% component-driven design runs on a scalable Figma design system with design tokens, variants, responsive components, and nested components.


Design architecture is Ideal for small projects with a team size of less than 5.
